thread.title: STL top star Jon Hamm shines during Blues' Winter Classic win
thread.title_full: STL top star Jon Hamm shines during Blues' Winter Classic win

author: Joe Holleman St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: STL top star Jon Hamm shines during Blues' Winter Classic win
text:
Get your daily dose of local news right here. Close 
Jeremy Roenick interviews Jon Hamm at the 2017 Winter Classic at Busch Stadium on Monday, Jan. 2, 2017. STL top star Jon Hamm shines during Blues' Winter Classic win 12 hrs ago ( … ) 
Jeremy Roenick interviews Jon Hamm at the 2017 Winter Classic at Busch Stadium on Monday, Jan. 2, 2017. 
It may have been the 4-1 victory, or it may have been the 46,000-plus fans that made the Blues' victory on Monday over the hated Chicago Blackhawks such an enjoyable affair. 
Or it may have been the endearing and energetic appearance of STL #1 celeb Jon Hamm for an in-game interview. 
Along with reaffirming his lifelong love of the Blues, Hamm inadvertently pointed out to the announcer — former hated Hawk center Jeremy Roenick — that Roenick never won a Stanley Cup with the Chicago skate team. 
Roenick: "What will this city do if they can ever get to that Stanely Cup and win one?" 
Hamm: "They'll lose their minds. And I think that's going to happen sooner rather than later. You know, I've been around for some close ones; back in your day as well, when we had some heartbreakers. But you know, it's hard to win one of those things ... as you well know ." 
And while it is indeed true that Roenick never did play for a Stanley Cup winner in his 20-year career, it also seems that "Mad Men" star Hamm is too polite to have intentionally slipped that in as a dig, right? 
Right?
